name: Groovy Death
description:
Groovy Death

Finally the Beta version is here. Now you're able to party with the funky zombies until the angel of death take you away from their tongues.

Watch out things are pretty dancing around here so if you think you're not able to funk things up enough with the Minigun don't take the risk.

If you like this version you can share your ideas with us; leave us what do you really  like to see in the full version.

The game is based on Polymorphic Grid asset developed by our team and it's available for free on Unity Asset Store. You can check it by the following link:

https://u3d.as/2Fqk
